mapper.insert: insert into lecturecomment(lectureseq, id, content, wdate, updatewdate, delflg) values(#{lectureseq}, #{id}, #{content}, now(), now(), 0)
mapper.select: select c.*, u.filename, u.newfilename from lecturecomment c join user u on c.id = u.id where c.lectureseq=#{lectureseq} and c.delflg=0 order by c.seq desc limit #{start}, #{dataCount}
select ifnull(count(*), 0) from lecturecomment where lectureseq=#{lectureseq} and delflg=0
select u.* from lecturecomment c join user u on c.id = u.id where c.seq=#{seq} and c.lectureseq=#{lectureseq}
